card.data.cloud_walking.name: Cloud Walking
card.data.cloud_walking.actions.basic:
Move<sprite name="card_icon_move"><style="value">2</style>.
The cost of <style="value">Plain</style>, <style="value">Desert</style> and <style="value">Marsh</style> is <style="status">Reduced by 1</style>
card.data.cloud_walking.actions.advanced: Move<sprite name="card_icon_move"><style="value">2</style>. The cost of <style="value">Plain</style>, <style="value">Desert</style> and <style="value">Marsh</style> is <style="status">Reduced by 2</style>. You may pay <style="value">Blue</style> Mana to enable travel through <style="value">Lakes</style> for <style="value">Free</style>
